Description: St Antony holding a closed book against his chest with his left hand and leaning on a walking stick from which hangs a bell, a pig at his left; copy after Marcantonio Engraving
Bibliographic references: Delaborde 1888 / Marc-Antoine Raimondi: Etude Historique et Critique suivie d'un catalogue raisonné des oeuvres du maitre (129.74)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased through: F A C Prestel (sale Frankfurt, 16.v.1870/2432)
